title: How to Track Someoneâ€™s Location in Google Maps

steps.title: Open Google Maps.
steps.content: Open Google Maps. This app icon is located either on your homepage or the app drawer. It looks like a multicolored map pin. If you want to use a web browser, you can; go to https://maps.google.com .

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. [1] X Research source You'll see your circular profile picture in the top right corner of your screen and a menu will appear. If you're using a web browser, instead of tapping your profile picture, click the three-line menu icon in the top left corner of your browser to access the same menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Location Sharing.
steps.content: Tap Location Sharing . It's in the first grouping (on a mobile device) or the second grouping (in a web browser) of menu options next to an icon of a default profile icon with radio waves. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap a profile picture to track.
steps.content: Tap a profile picture to track. Once you tap Location Sharing , you'll see a map with everyone who is currently sharing their location with you at the bottom of the screen. Tapping on their profile picture at the bottom of the screen will zoom in on their location. [4] X Research source If you want to request someone's location so you can see where they are, tap Request in the app in Profile > Location Sharing .
